Name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno (Chapter 3)
About the game: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a point and click adventure with the scent of legendary classics such as The Secret of Monkey Island or The Day of the Tentacle. The game is completely designed in MS Paint and it is divided in different chapters. This is Chapter 3. Did You Finish Chapter 2? To play Chapter 3 you must introduce the password given when you got through Chapter 2. If you haven’t, please download Chapter 2 and come back once you have completed it.
